skills.name: Chrome DevTools
skills.pattern: Elements, Console, Network, Sources, Performance, Memory tabs

skills.name: Breakpoints
skills.pattern: Line, conditional, DOM, XHR, event listener breakpoints

skills.name: Console Methods
skills.pattern: console.log, .table, .group, .time, .trace, .assert

skills.name: Network Panel
skills.pattern: Timing, headers, payload, preview, filter by type

skills.name: Source Maps
skills.pattern: Map minified/transpiled code to source

skills.name: Node Inspector
skills.pattern: node --inspect app.js, chrome://inspect

skills.name: VS Code Debugger
skills.pattern: launch.json, breakpoints, watch, call stack

skills.name: Debug Module
skills.pattern: DEBUG=app:* node app.js, namespace-based logging

skills.name: Binary Search Debug
skills.pattern: Comment half the code, narrow down to bug location

skills.name: Rubber Duck Debugging
skills.pattern: Verbally explain code line by line, find logical gaps

skills.name: Git Bisect
skills.pattern: git bisect start/good/bad - binary search commits

skills.name: Print Debugging
skills.pattern: Log inputs, outputs, state at key points

skills.name: Reproduce First
skills.pattern: Reliable repro -> Isolate -> Understand -> Fix -> Verify

skills.name: Chrome Performance
skills.pattern: Record, flame chart, main thread activity, FPS

skills.name: Lighthouse
skills.pattern: Performance, accessibility, SEO, best practices scores

skills.name: Memory Profiling
skills.pattern: Heap snapshots, allocation timeline, detect memory leaks

skills.name: Node Profiling
skills.pattern: node --prof, clinic.js, 0x flame graphs

skills.name: CPU Profiling
skills.pattern: Sample stack traces, find hot functions

skills.name: Flame Graphs
skills.pattern: Width = time spent, stack depth = call hierarchy

skills.name: Memory Leaks
skills.pattern: Growing heap, detached DOM, closures holding references

skills.name: Heap Snapshots
skills.pattern: Compare snapshots, find retained objects

skills.name: Garbage Collection
skills.pattern: Mark-sweep, generational GC, GC pauses

skills.name: Network Debugging
skills.pattern: Status codes, CORS errors, timing breakdown

skills.name: Charles/Fiddler
skills.pattern: Inspect, modify, mock HTTP traffic

skills.name: React DevTools
skills.pattern: Component tree, props, state, profiler

skills.name: React Profiler
skills.pattern: Why did this render? Commit timing, ranked chart

skills.name: Redux DevTools
skills.pattern: Action log, state diff, time travel, export/import

skills.name: API Debugging
skills.pattern: Postman/Insomnia, curl, request replay

skills.name: Production Debugging
skills.pattern: Structured logs, correlation IDs, feature flags, canary

skills.name: Debugging Tools
skills.pattern: ndb, why-is-node-running, leakage, autocannon
